name: First Aid: Appendix Surgery
description:
a young girl's append is sick, her need to make a appendix surgey.
Play appendix surgery and step into the shoes of a hospital doctor as you examine a young girl by the name of Tara that may have appendicitis. With the nurses aid use your finger to pinpoint the exact location where the patient is experiencing severe pain by applying pressure and then issue a blood test to check for abnormally high white blood cell count. Once you've diagnosed the condition proceed to the operating theatre table to remove the inflamed organ.high fun
